meanings.definition: Showing a shy or modest reluctance to give details about oneself
meanings.sent1: She was coyish about her personal life, preferring to keep it private.
meanings.sent2: The new student was coyish and didn't talk much about where they came from.
meanings.sent3: The coyish detective refused to reveal any information about the case, adding to the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her coyish smile hinted at secrets she was not willing to share.
meanings.sent5: The coyish behavior of the cat made it hard to predict its next move.

meanings.definition: Playfully shy or reserved in a flirtatious manner
meanings.sent1: She gave him a coyish smile before looking away playfully.
meanings.sent2: The actor's coyish behavior on stage charmed the audience.
meanings.sent3: His coyish teasing always made her blush and giggle.
meanings.sent4: The coyish banter between them added a touch of romance to the evening.
meanings.sent5: The coyish wink she gave him hinted at her playful intentions.
